groups.name: thinker.cloud.db
groups.description: Configuration properties for Thinker Cloud database.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.data-scope.enable
properties.description: Whether to enable data scope filtering.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.data-scope.scope-name
properties.description: The name of the field to limit the data scope.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.data-scope.user-scope-name
properties.description: The name of the field to limit the user's data scope.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.data-scope.ignore-tables
properties.description: The tables to ignore for data scope filtering.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.tenant.column
properties.description: The column name used to maintain tenant information.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.tenant.ignore-tables
properties.description: The tables to ignore for tenant isolation.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.db.tenant.ignore-tenant-ids
properties.description: The tenant IDs to ignore for tenant isolation.
